comments.body: This is how a scam accusation should be reported, at least with as much information and evidence that you were scammed as possibleCode:[b][color=black]What happened: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Scammers Profile Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Reference Link: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Amount Scammed: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Payment Method: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Proof of Payment: [/color][/b][b][color=black]PM/Chat Logs: [/color][/b][b][color=black]Additional Notes: [/color][/b]Maybe their reasoning could be genuine, maybe not. Unfortunately, you have no choice but to wait and see what happens next.
